title: 6.IC.1
text: The student will assess the impact of computing technologies on local society.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Explain how computing impacts innovation and describe the development of new computing technologies in communication, entertainment, and business.
Discuss how computing technologies have influenced various industries and sectors locally.
Research simple and complex problems that computing systems can be used to solve.
Analyze the implications of emerging technologies and potential real-world impact in the local community.

title: 6.IC.2
text: The student will analyze the impact of screen time on physical and mental health.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Analyze and describe the impact of excessive technology usage may have on one's physical health.
Examine the impact of blue light on sleep patterns and regulations.
Propose strategies that provide alternatives of technology usage to promote physical activity.
Discuss the potential impact the use of social media may have on self-identity and mental health.
Define cyberbullying and its impact on one's health and well-being.
Discuss the possible effects of cyberbullying.
Identify ways to report illegal or psychologically maladaptive online behavior.

title: 6.IC.3
text: The student will explore career pathways and identify how computer science and computational thinking practices align with these pathways.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Investigate a career of interest and determine how computer science and computational thinking practices are used in the chosen career.

title: 6.IC.4
text: The student will identify copyrighted and licensed software material.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify the role of software licenses, including open-source, and why they are used.
Compare and contrast the positives and negatives of various software licenses.

title: 6.IC.5
text: The student will describe the impacts of computing network architecture, including the role of the Internet in society.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Discuss ethical issues and laws related to accessibility, censorship, privacy, access, and safety while using the Internet.
Explain the role broadband connectivity has in social life, culture, and global economy.

title: 6.IC.6
text: The student will investigate and analyze the impact of the progression and advancement of AI technologies on industries.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Discuss the type of industries that may be impacted by the use and integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI).
Compare and contrast the evolving nature of work across diverse industries because of the progression and advancement of Artificial Intelligence.
